channel.title: How do i STOP NOCLIPING WITHOUT IpBan
channel.description: how can i stop nocliping without people getting an IP ban

item.title: How do i STOP NOCLIPING WITHOUT IpBan
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

make that only admin + can use it
search for noclip
and put admin requirement to use.
Search for
“tried to noclip” or something smilar and put /* infront of command and */ at the end of it…

example:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourname")) { // <- example if you want to be the onlyone to use it.
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); // message sent to evryone when someone uses ::noclip
            appendToBanned(playerName); // <-delete this to make them not banned
            disconnected = true; // <- if player should be loged out or not. 
}

edited example:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("gon3d34d123")) { // cause only i will be able to use it.
  /*
           PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); //  this will not be in the code annymore 
            appendToBanned(playerName); // player will not be banned due this is not part of the code.
*/
            disconnected = false; // <- player will stay logged on.
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do i STOP NOCLIPING WITHOUT IpBan
